cast.name: 伊薇特·蕾切尔 Yvette Rachelle

introduction: "Way to Abbottabad" is a hard-hitting political and family thriller focusing on the uplifting tale of a man's perseverance in pursuit of justice which leads to peace among the nations in order to benefit the world in its prevailing battle against a backdrop of evil. Once, the WORLD was divided as B.C and A.D. Silently, the world divided again as"Before 9/11" and "After 9/11." It was not written on rock, still undocumented and unspeakable. "Way To Abbottabad" is the chariot that will band together the people to restore the overwhelming joy that we had B9/11.
